No, I'm as white as you.

That's awful.

To Germany?

- Mushrooms. -
A toast.
To your father.

translation.ja: 選択肢はない 上司に交渉してくれ

translation.en: If they refuse, I do, too.
I've no desire to be your scapegoat.
translation.ja: 身代わりになりたくない

translation.en: I'd argue the Architect of the Final Solution has plenty to answer for.
translation.ja: “最終的解決”の設計者が 語れる事もあるはず

translation.en: The Architect... of the Final Solution.
translation.ja: 最終的解決の…　設計者

translation.en: - Do you deny your title? - We love nicknames.
translation.ja: 肩書は不服か？ あだ名は好かれる

translation.en: They used to call me the Little Jew.
Did you know that?
I read about Nuremberg.
translation.ja: ニュルンベルクの有様

translation.en: Those swine, Wisliceny and Höttl.
translation.ja: ヴィスリツェニーと ハートルはブタだ

translation.en: Blaming the absent to escape the noose.
translation.ja: 不在者に罪を着せ 首吊りを逃れた

translation.en: Well, then refute them. Come to Israel.
translation.ja: 反論すればいい イスラエルで

translation.en: Make your case to the world.
I would rather die...
than have my history told the way someone else would like it to have been.
translation.ja: 自分の歴史を 好きなように語られるより

translation.en: You have no interest in what I have to say,
translation.ja: 私の言い分など 興味ないだろう

translation.en: unless it confirms what you think you already know.
translation.ja: 自分の知識を 裏付けたいだけだ

translation.en: Tell me, what is it that I think I already know?
The...
- May I have a cigarette? - You may not.
The exact consequences of my work were kept hidden from me.
translation.ja: 任務の目的は 知らされていない

translation.en: I was merely a cog in a machine...
translation.ja: 私は機械の部品にすぎない

translation.en: - - ...digging its way to hell.
translation.ja: 私は機械の部品にすぎない 地獄への道を掘っていた

translation.en: By the end, I was chained to my desk.
translation.ja: 最後には机にしばられていた

translation.en: Twenty hours a day.
My job was simple.
Save the country I love from being destroyed.
translation.ja: 愛する国を被害から守る事

translation.en: Is your job any different?
But none of what I say matters. Your lawyers and your lying press
translation.ja: 何を言っても無駄 弁護士とウソつき記者団は―

translation.en: will try the man they think they know, not the one who sits before you now.
translation.ja: 目の前の男ではなく 架空の人物を裁く

translation.en: Forty, sixty, eighty, five hundred.
Okay.
Graciela?
- Eh... - Si?
Uh, groceries.
Can someone else feed him?
- It's your turn. - I know.
translation.ja: お前の番だ 承知だ

translation.en: I'm... I'm asking for a favor.
translation.ja: 頼む　代わってくれ

translation.en: All done.
You're the man who grabbed me. I know your voice.
translation.ja: 私を掴んだ男だな 声を覚えている

translation.en: Yes.
Please, just tell me. My family, are they safe?
translation.ja: 教えてくれ　家族は無事か？

translation.en: You said you had news.
Do you know the number of people buried here because they wouldn't listen?
translation.ja: ここに埋められた人間が 何人いると思う？

translation.en: Everyone should visit this place once in a while
to remember things can go the wrong way if you don't behave the proper way.
translation.ja: 素行が悪いと風向きが変わる 覚えておけ

translation.en: Two Jews returned a rented Buick to a shop near Acassuso.
translation.ja: ユダヤ人が２人 アカスソで 車を借りた

translation.en: They paid for it in US dollars,
but the vendor called the police when he saw the license plate had been tampered with.
translation.ja: プレートがいじってあると 車屋が警察に通報した

translation.en: - And the rental documents? - We don't know.
Their identification was forged.
We'll talk to shopkeepers.
translation.ja: この辺の店に手を回す

translation.en: If so much as an empanada is paid for in dollars, I want us to know.
translation.ja: エンパナーダ１個でも 米ドルで買えばすぐわかる

translation.en: It's too tight.
Don't any of them come with some actual shape to them?
translation.ja: もう少し 幅のある物はないか？

translation.en: - Is there any medium? Okay. - We are running out of time.
translation.ja: Ｍサイズは？ 時間がない

translation.en: We have to get the signature.
He's being belligerent.
The problem is he's got no incentive to sign it.
translation.ja: サインする動機がない

translation.en: If the easy way doesn't work, do it the hard way.
translation.ja: 言っても効かないなら 荒業を使え

translation.en: You have my permission.
This guy convinced rabbis to load the trains themselves.
translation.ja: ラビを自ら電車に乗るよう 言いくるめた奴だ

translation.en: And not by force.
You can't strong arm a guy like that,
translation.ja: そんな男に 圧力をかけても無駄

translation.en: but if we can relate to him, if you appeal to his--
translation.ja: 奴の身になって訴える…

translation.en: Humanity?
His ego makes him feel like he's in control.
translation.ja: 自尊心に　自分に主導権が あると思わせる

translation.en: I appreciate you're trying to help, but he's as slippery as they come.
translation.ja: 助言は感謝するが 奴はずる賢い

translation.en: Spots tricks a mile away. This only works if we wear him down.
translation.ja: 騙しには勘付く 疲れさせるしかない

translation.en: If he knows there's no escape, eventually he'll yield.
translation.ja: 逃げ場がないとわかれば 折れる

translation.en: - That's not working. - You've done your job.
Will you leave me to do mine?
Let's put the shoe on your foot, shall we?
You're a soldier ordered to make me sign this,
translation.ja: これにサインさせろと 命令された

translation.en: but are you or your superiors responsible for that order?
translation.ja: 命令の責任は誰にある 君 それとも上司？

translation.en: I'm offering you a fair trial.
translation.ja: 公平な裁判を提供する

translation.en: Herr Captor, I need the lavatory, please.
translation.ja: 捕獲者さん トイレに行きたい

translation.en: It's quite serious.
translation.ja: もう…　ガマンできない

translation.en: This would be much easier if I had something to read.
translation.ja: 読書でもできればいいんだが

translation.en: Should we lend him your copy of Mein Kampf or mine?
I remember visiting my father at the Tramway and Electrical. I was nine.
translation.ja: ９歳の時 父が働く電機会社を訪ねた

translation.en: He introduces me so proudly.
My boy! He says, This is my boy!
So, imagine my dismay when I had to use the bathroom and unleash sheer hell.
translation.ja: そんな時トイレにかけこんで 派手にかました

translation.en: I said, Everybody does it, Papa. Everybody shits.
translation.ja: “父さん 人は誰でも クソをする”

translation.en: I think about that still, to this day.
If only you'd cover my nose as well as my eyes.
translation.ja: 目と一緒に鼻も覆ってくれ

translation.en: So, this is the master race.
Oh, we used to say to be the perfect Nazi,
translation.ja: 完璧なナチスは ゲーリング並に細身 ゲッベルス並に長身で

translation.en: you had to be as slim as Goering, as tall as Goebbels, and as blond as Hitler!
translation.ja: ゲーリング並に細身 ゲッベルス並に長身で ヒトラー同様金髪

translation.en: May I wipe now, Herr Captor?
My family, are they safe, please?
- Of course, they are. -
- What do you think of us? - Thank you.
Thank you.
Herr Captor.
I wonder if I might keep speaking with you.
translation.ja: このまま話し続けて いいかな？

translation.en: That Jobnik they send, he won't listen.
translation.ja: いつもの体たらく者は 何も聞かない

translation.en: Round face, straight brown hair. Heavy set.
translation.ja: 丸顔 茶色の直毛で かっぷくが良い

translation.en: I want eyes at all major transit points.
translation.ja: 主要交通網を全て監視しろ

translation.en: This is one of the Jews who took Ricardo Klement.
translation.ja: クレメントを誘拐した ユダヤ人の１人だ

translation.en: - Do you want some more? - No, thank you.
translation.ja: もっと食べる？ 結構よ

translation.en: Oh, great, beef again.
I'd kill for a fish.
Shut up and eat your cubed cheese.
translation.ja: 黙って角チーズを食え

translation.en: Why is it so bland?
- It's missing the bacteria. - Or a nice goat's cheese.
translation.ja: 菌に欠ける ヤギのチーズ

translation.en: You know that Lifta cheese back home?
It's really strong.
[chuckling You remember when Miriam made a cheesecake with it by accident
translation.ja: あれでミリアムが チーズケーキ作って―

translation.en: and you ate a whole slice just to make her happy.
translation.ja: 喜ばす為に 一切れ丸々食べた

translation.en: No, Mir, this is really good. Thank you.
translation.ja: “おいしいよ ミリアム”って

translation.en: You know, Lifta is an Arab cheese.
translation.ja: レフタはアラブのチーズだ

translation.en: Is it? I didn't, uh,
translation.ja: そう？ そこまで調べなかった

translation.en: - ask to see its papers. - Oh, this is a joke, right?
translation.ja: そう？ そこまで調べなかった これは冗談だろ？

translation.en: Giving money to our enemies.
The people who want us dead. It's hilarious.
Aharoni, you tried that one yet?
translation.ja: アハロニ 試したか？

translation.en: - See if it works on Eichmann. - He'll sign. We're close.
translation.ja: アイヒマンに もうじきサインする

translation.en: We should string him up and beat a signature out of him.
That's what they'd do to us, but no, that'd be too easy.
translation.ja: 俺達はそうされたのに 楽過ぎるから―

translation.en: Instead we have to feed him.
Relax, Moshe. It's just cheese.
translation.ja: モーシェ ただのチーズだ

translation.en: Moshe.
You're up next.
No, it's all right.
I'll take his shift.
Why won't you sign?
I'm an Argentine citizen accused of crimes committed in Germany.
translation.ja: 私はドイツで犯した罪を 問われるアルゼンチン国民だ

translation.en: Don't be modest.
Lithuania, Hungary, Poland. You were quite the traveler.
translation.ja: リトアニア ハンガリー ポーランドまで足を延ばした

translation.en: I should be tried in one of those countries.
translation.ja: その国のどれかで 裁かれるべき

translation.en: Nah.
I don't buy it.
You can't win a war if soldiers don't follow their orders.
translation.ja: 兵隊が従わなければ 戦争に勝てない

translation.en: No, that's not good enough.
- The truth will out. - What is truth? Whose truth?
translation.ja: 真実は暴かれる 真実だと？　誰の？

translation.en: - No one will listen to me. - I wanna listen.
translation.ja: 聞かないくせに 僕が聞く

translation.en: Be treated like a dog. A show trial.
translation.ja: どうせ犬扱いだ 見世物裁判

translation.en: To pin everything on me. We held those, too, you know.
translation.ja: 全て私のせい 我々も同じ事をしてきた

translation.en: The preening prosecutors, the compliant judges.
translation.ja: 得意顔の検察官と いいなりの裁判官

translation.en: My God. This--
That's--
You look like shit.
Don't worry. I'm not gonna hurt you.
Some of your men want to. I can smell it when they're in the room.
translation.ja: 他の奴らは― 部屋に入ると殺気が臭う

translation.en: - May I ask you something? - I'm not in a position to refuse.
translation.ja: 聞いてもいいかな 断れる立場ではない

translation.en: Is it true you called the camps liquidation machines?
translation.ja: 収容所を “粛清機(せいしゅくき)”と呼んでた？

translation.en: Mengele called you all kosher salami.
translation.ja: メンゲレは君らを “コーシャーサラミ”と

translation.en: Everyone used flippant terms for dirty work.
translation.ja: メンゲレは君らを “コーシャーサラミ”と 手を汚す仕事の呼び名だ

translation.en: - To make us seem like animals. - We're all animals.
translation.ja: 動物だと思うように 誰もが動物だ

translation.en: Fighting for scraps on the Serengeti.
translation.ja: セレンゲティを徘徊する

translation.en: Some of us just have bigger teeth than others.
You know I tried to help.
For years, I got your people out of the country.
translation.ja: 何年も君らを国外に逃がした

translation.en: That was my solution. I wanted the Jews sent to Madagascar.
translation.ja: ユダヤ人をマダガスカルに 送って解決しようとした

translation.en: Yes, dying of malaria is nicer than poisoned gas. Very thoughtful of you.
translation.ja: マラリアで死ぬ方が ガス室より人間的だな

translation.en: Other countries wouldn't take you.
But that didn't stop me from trying. I negotiated.
translation.ja: それでも努力した 交渉した―

translation.en: With your Dr. Kasztner in Hungary.
translation.ja: ハンガリーのカツナー博士と

translation.en: Trucks for lives.
translation.ja: トラックを交換条件にして―

translation.en: We tried to save Jewish lives.
translation.ja: ユダヤ人を救おうとした

translation.en: He was a hero,
yet your people shot him in cold blood. Imagine what they'd do to me.
translation.ja: なのに君らは撃ち殺した 私は何をされるんだ

translation.en: - I didn't know about that. - Hmm.
That's why you're here, Herr Captor.
translation.ja: イスラエルは話を聞く―

translation.en: To make me think Israel will listen to me.
translation.ja: そう思わせる為に君はいる

translation.en: I just always fancied myself a barber.
translation.ja: 床屋になりたかっただけだ

translation.en: Your razor.
The brand?
It's a lot older than you, I think.
translation.ja: 君の年より昔からある

translation.en: From Solingen, like me.
translation.ja: 私同様ゾーリンゲンの出だ

translation.en: My Papa died in Israel.
translation.ja: 父はイスラエルで死んだ

translation.en: One of those pesky Jews who survived.
translation.ja: しぶとく生き残ったユダヤ人

translation.en: Oh. So, you didn't lose anyone.
translation.ja: 君は誰も亡くしてないのか

translation.en: I'm glad.
I don't know what I'd have become if my family had...
translation.ja: 家族に何かあったら私は…

translation.en: I spoke to him.
Why?
I was trying to get him to sign.
- Curious. - What did he say to you?
translation.ja: 好奇心も 彼は何て？

translation.en: He said we're all animals.
translation.ja: 僕らはみんな動物だと

translation.en: The Jews?
No, no, everybody. Jews, Germans. All animals.
translation.ja: いや 全員 ユダヤ人もドイツ人も

translation.en: Bullshit.
If we're animals, he would be in pieces now.
translation.ja: 私達が動物なら 八つ裂きにしてる

translation.en: - He says he was following orders. - He chose to do it.
translation.ja: 命令だったと 選べたはず

translation.en: And we are choosing to keep him alive.
translation.ja: 彼を生かすのが私達の選択

translation.en: To let him speak, but not here, not now.
translation.ja: 話させるのは 今ここで ではないわ

translation.en: Keep your distance.
- - Eleven...
twelve...
thirteen.
The boys love this.
- Fourteen - I prefer the older stuff.
- Carlito Gardel. - Fifteen.
- El Zorzal Criollo. - Sixteen.
translation.ja: “エル･ゾザール―” “クリオージョ”

translation.en: - Seventeen. - Enough.
- Enough? - Enough.
Tell me about you,
Herr Captor.
I want to know what it was that brought our lives together like this.
translation.ja: なぜかこのように会ったか 知りたい

translation.en: How about this? You sign, I'll tell you anything you want to know.
translation.ja: 署名したら何でも答える

translation.en: Ah- ha. You're striking a deal.
I'm establishing a trading post.
translation.ja: 交換条件を述べてるだけ

translation.en: But I'm fresh out of trucks before you ask.
translation.ja: 署名するまで話はお預け

translation.en: It is... ha!
It is poor form to negotiate from a position of weakness.
translation.ja: 弱い立場で交渉するのは

translation.en: There's an art to these things.
Always know the man who sits across the bargaining table.
translation.ja: 駆け引きの相手を 知ってからだ

translation.en: Well, now's your chance.
You sign, I'll tell you anything you wanna know.
translation.ja: 署名すれば何でも話そう

translation.en: I would like to offer a counter.
Your name in return for my consideration of your terms.
translation.ja: 名前を教えてくれたら 条件を考慮する

translation.en: Just your name.
Is that asking so much?
- Dani. -
We are running out of time.
translation.ja: １９６０年５月19日 時間がない １９６０年５月19日

translation.en: I'll see you in an hour.
I am so close, sir. He's going to break. I know he's going to break.
translation.ja: もうすぐで折れます 警察が近所を 嗅ぎ回っています

translation.en: We're hearing Nazis are searching the neighborhood.
translation.ja: 警察が近所を 嗅ぎ回っています

translation.en: I recommend we move Eichmann to another safe house.
translation.ja: アイヒマンを別の隠れ家に

translation.en: We can't move him. It's too risky.
translation.ja: 移動できない　危険だ

translation.en: Forget the damn paper. Forget him signing. Let's just get him out.
translation.ja: 書類も署名もいいから とにかく出よう

translation.en: It's more complicated that, Yaakov. El Al is the only way out.
translation.ja: 状況は複雑だ エル･アルしか方法はない

translation.en: - What do you mean it's more complicated-- - Yaakov. Let's just relax, okay?
translation.ja: 何が複雑だ？ 落ち着け ヤコブ

translation.en: Look at me.
I do want the world to know what really happened.
translation.ja: 真実を世界に知らせたい

translation.en: But it needs to be fair.
People have to listen.
In Israel, they'll just want to see me suffer.
translation.ja: イスラエルは 私が苦しめばそれでいい

translation.en: No, not if they see you the way I've seen you.
translation.ja: 僕が見た姿を 人が見ればそうならない

translation.en: Talk to them the way you talk to me.
translation.ja: 僕に話したように 話せばいい

translation.en: You can tell your story, the real one.
In a country where my family cannot even come to watch me die.
translation.ja: 家族が死に目に会えない国だ

translation.en: No.
No, I would rather end it all.
Right now.
Please, just ask your superiors...
for my family's sake. Please.
translation.ja: 家族の為に お願いだ

translation.en: Dani's ready for him.
Hey, you're making everyone very nervous.
Talk a walk just round the block, okay?
translation.ja: ちょっと散歩して来い

translation.en: You check the next one. I'll take a look here.
translation.ja: 〈お前は隣を 俺はこの家を調べる〉

translation.en: Hide him, quickly!
Go, go, go.
- Anything? - No.
Peter, help!
- No wonder he hasn't broken. - All he knows is my name.
translation.ja: 折れない訳だ 名前を教えただけ

translation.en: I've just spoken to him. Is it true you give him cigarettes?
translation.ja: 今 奴と話した タバコを吸わせたのか？

translation.en: Yeah.
Oh, of course, he wouldn't break.
He's getting room service here, catering to his every whim.
translation.ja: ルームサービス付きで 面倒みてもらってたら

translation.en: Did you think for even a second what was going to happen, huh?
We're all going to rot in a cell because of you.
translation.ja: 全員牢屋で腐る事になる

translation.en: - I can get the signature. - Give me a break.
translation.ja: 署名させる いい加減にしろ

translation.en: - That's bullshit! - Let him.
- Let him try. - Bullshit.
Let him try.
That's nonsense. He's compromised us all again.
translation.ja: そんなバカな またしても全員を危機に

translation.en: Sir, I can do it.
We've got no choice.
Get us his signature.
- I think you should sign. - Why?
translation.ja: 署名すべきだ なぜ？

translation.en: Because I believe you.
Tell them what you told me, about the orders you ignored.
They'll only hear the ones I took.
translation.ja: 従った命令を裁かれる

translation.en: You and I both know I shall die in Israel.
translation.ja: 私がイスラエルで死ぬのは お互いわかっている

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Peter.
Why am I the one guilty for my country's mistakes?
translation.ja: 国の過ちを なぜ私１人が償う？

translation.en: So, you would say what you did to my people was a mistake?
We were told that Germany,
translation.ja: 希望と可能性に満ちた ドイツが―

translation.en: our land of hope and possibility, was being overrun.
translation.ja: 乗っ取られる そう教わった

translation.en: - If we were to survive-- - Yes, but there's a line.
translation.ja: 生き残る為… 限度がある

translation.en: And you believe you people have found that line, do you? Funny.
translation.ja: 君らに限度はあるのか？

translation.en: I've heard the rumors, a facility in the Negev Desert.
translation.ja: ネゲブ砂漠に 施設があるらしいな

translation.en: Do you know a hydrogen bomb rarely asks the age of his victims?
translation.ja: 水素爆弾は 被害者の年齢など聞かない

translation.en: That's not the same and you know it.
You watch, they'll cremate my body.
I don't know. I don't know what they'll do in Israel.
translation.ja: わからない イスラエルで何されるか

translation.en: And not everyone will give you the chance to say your peace.
translation.ja: 誰もが聞く耳を持つとは 限らない

translation.en: Whom did we take from you, Peter?
Think about your boys.
If you sign, they'll know you told the truth.
translation.ja: 署名すれば 証明できる

translation.en: That you went to Israel with nothing to hide.
translation.ja: 逃げずに イスラエルに行ったと

translation.en: Whom did you lose?
- We lost six million-- - I'm asking about you.
translation.ja: ６百万人… 君の事を聞いている

translation.en: Oh.
She's beautiful.
She was more than my sister.
She was my teacher,
and parent.
My friend.
She had three beautiful children.
May I ask how she died?
We think... in the woods near Lublin.
translation.ja: ルブリンの森…　だと思う

translation.en: - I'm afraid I don't-- - I wasn't asking.
translation.ja: 覚えがない… 聞きたくない

translation.en: Of course.
She would have died...
protecting the little ones. I know that much.
translation.ja: 助けようとして死んだ

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I am truly sorry.
May I...
May I ask her name?
- Fruma. - Fruma.
Her name was Fruma.
I saw you... watching the trains.
translation.ja: あんたは… 息子と電車を見ていた

translation.en: You were counting the wagons with your boy.
Just like Fruma used to do with her little boy.
translation.ja: フルマも息子とそうしてた

translation.en: The only difference...
is that her boy is dead, and yours is alive.
translation.ja: その子は死んだが あんたの息子は生きている

translation.en: Are you a family man, Peter?
Maybe one day.
It only gets harder with age. Trust me.
translation.ja: 年を取ると辛くなるぞ

translation.en: You have a woman, I'd assume, so why no children?
translation.ja: 恋人はいるとして なぜ子がいない？

translation.en: I think you know why.
I think perhaps you worry that the future will look like the past.
translation.ja: 未来が過去のようになるのを 恐れている

translation.en: I hope that changes... for your sake.
translation.ja: 君の為にも そうならない事を願う

translation.en: I would like to ask one last thing.
I would like to see my wife again one last time before I die.
translation.ja: 死ぬ前にもう１度 妻に会いたい

translation.en: If you sign, I'll make sure you see your wife again.
translation.ja: 署名したら 会える事を約束する

translation.en: You swear it, Peter?
On Fruma?
On Fruma.
You did it.
I'll need to call a friend to bring more pesos.
translation.ja: 〈仲間にペソを 持って来させる〉

translation.en: You can wait at my place. It's nearby. Follow me.
translation.ja: 〈家で待っててくれ すぐ近くだ〉 〈ついてきな〉

translation.en: We know you work for the Jews.
If you want us to stop, you must tell me where he is, my dear.
translation.ja: やめてほしければ 居場所を吐け

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
- Stop! Stop! Stop! -
translation.ja: やめろ！ やめてくれ！

translation.en: Stop!
My name is Klaus Eichmann.
translation.ja: クラウス･アイヒマンと言う

translation.en: I just want my father back.
Please.
Help.
Help me and I can make them stop.
Let's clear the house of all personal items.
Moshe, prep the cars.
- Yaakov, get the luggage ready. - Okay.
- Oh, where's Graciela? Someone call her. - I'm on it, boss.
translation.ja: グラシエラは？　電話しろ 了解です

translation.en: Go get Eichmann ready. We leave in one hour. Let's go.
translation.ja: アイヒマンの支度をしろ １時間後に出る

translation.en: - Okay. Yeah. - Time to go, is it?
translation.ja: よし 行く時間か？ ああ

translation.en: I'll examine you and then I'll give you a shot to relax.
translation.ja: 診察した後 鎮静剤を打つわね

translation.en: Understood?
Sounds very peaceful.
Sit back.
You remind me of her.
His Fruma.
I said I couldn't help, but perhaps I can.
translation.ja: 覚えてないと言ったが

translation.en: Her story, your story,
reminds me of when I was sent east.
translation.ja: 東に送られた時を思い出した

translation.en: General Müller asked I check on the Einsatzgruppen,
translation.ja: ミュラー将軍の命令で アインザッツグルッペンへ

translation.en: the morale had dropped. They needed an authority figure...
translation.ja: ミュラー将軍の命令で アインザッツグルッペンへ 権限を持つ者が 士気を高める為だ

translation.en: to reinvigorate them.
translation.ja: 権限を持つ者が 士気を高める為だ

translation.en: And, to my mind...
I wondered if I might solve the issue.
translation.ja: 解決できないものかと 頭をひねった

translation.en: Find a less chaotic manner of proceeding other than vans and bullets.
translation.ja: ガストラックや 弾丸以外の方法で

translation.en: It was horrifying.
Five thousand Jews lined up to stand in this pit.
translation.ja: ユダヤ人５千人が 濠の前に並んだ

translation.en: I had to drink Schnapps to keep from fainting.
translation.ja: シュナップスで 気を失うのを防いだ

translation.en: I remember a woman and her baby.
translation.ja: 女と赤ん坊を覚えている

translation.en: She begged for the child's life.
translation.ja: 母は子の命乞いをした

translation.en: She lifted it up
as if she might give her baby to me, as if I might save it.
translation.ja: 救ってくれと 私に渡そうとした

translation.en: I would, on occasion,
translation.ja: たまには情けをかける

translation.en: do such things, an old acquaintance,
translation.ja: 知り合いや使えそうな―

translation.en: people who might be of use, but this--
Stop talking, please.
Then bang.
The bullet that killed her goes straight through her child first.
translation.ja: 弾丸は先に子を貫いてから 女を殺した

translation.en: I remember wiping its brains off my jacket.
translation.ja: 脳ミソを上着から拭ったよ

translation.en: Do you think that's how we did it, Peter?
translation.ja: そう殺してたらどうだ？

translation.en: Do you think that's how we killed Fruma?
One can hope it was that quick.
translation.ja: 素早く死ねただけいい

translation.en: That they didn't do the things some soldiers do,
translation.ja: 残忍な兵隊も中にはいるから

translation.en: but then we'll never know.
Peter, don't listen to him.
They'll say my death is justice
for all the people you lost.
translation.ja: 失った人が報われるのか

translation.en: That makes my life worth six million Frumas.
translation.ja: なら私の命は６百万の フルマに値する

translation.en: How does that make you feel, knowing that she's not worth the spit in my mouth?
translation.ja: フルマは 私のツバの価値もない

translation.en: - Let go of the syringe. Peter! - Do it, for God's sake.
Go on, do it you coward.
- Leave. - Don't.
- Make her worth something! - Get out.
translation.ja: 敵を討て 出て行け

translation.en: - Peter. - Leave.
- Is that what you want? - Leave right now!
Come on. Do it!
Rafi!
Get him out. He's ready.
translation.ja: 連れ出して 出発よ

translation.en: Leave the cars. Out the back.
Moshe, do your thing.
- Yep. - I got him.
Go around.
Come on. Come on.
The car's too small, we're not gonna fit.
translation.ja: 車は狭すぎる　全員乗れない

translation.en: Go get in the other car.
- There's no room. I'm staying.
translation.ja: あんたは？ 乗れない 僕は残る

translation.en: I'll find my own way home. Tell me what it was like.
translation.ja: 何とか戻るから 後で聞かせてくれ

translation.en: Aharoni.
- I should have-- - No, no. It's all right.
translation.ja: お前に… いや…　いいんだ

translation.en: You got what we needed.
I just thought... I just need him to be there.
translation.ja: 連れて帰れれば それでいいんだ

translation.en: I know, me too.
translation.ja: わかってる 僕もだ

translation.en: Our slot is in 15 minutes.
You'd better hope your people hurry up.
translation.ja: それまでに来る事を願う

translation.en: Don't worry.
- Hello, friend. - Hi. Passports.
translation.ja: 〈ご苦労だな〉 〈全員のパスポートを〉

translation.en: Hello, sir.
Too much Fernet... He's a monster on the stuff.
translation.ja: 〈フェルネットの 飲みすぎだ〉

translation.en: You have no idea.
- All clear. - Thank you.
- Goodbye. - Goodbye.
This is Inspector Rega.
Take him up. I'll get rid of the car.
translation.ja: 乗せろ　車を処分してくる

translation.en: We have to prevent them from flying. Understand?
translation.ja: 〈飛行機を止めろ〉 〈わかったな？〉

translation.en: At your service.
Radio Fuldner! They're at the airport.
translation.ja: 〈フルドナーに 飛行場だと報せろ！〉

translation.en: You are clear for landing, 25 right. Winds are two, three, four, and six.
translation.ja: 着陸クリア 右25 風は２３４６

translation.en: Three, five, five, eight, five, five. This is Buenos Aires.
translation.ja: ３５５８５５ こちらブエノスアイレス

translation.en: - - We have you on radar.
translation.ja: レーダーに映っている

translation.en: Quickly, strap him in.
Air traffic control. This is El Al 4XAGD. NOTAMS checked.
translation.ja: こちらエル･アル４ＸＡＧＤ 航空交通管制 ノータム了解

translation.en: Our flight path confirmed. Ready for takeoff.
translation.ja: 飛行経路 確認済み 離陸準備完了

translation.en: El Al, slot for you in five. Confirming landing permits now.
translation.ja: エル･アル ５分で離陸 着陸許可書 確認中

translation.en: Can I speak to you for a moment?
I'm sorry.
I lost it over there.
- No. It's just about you. - You know that I love you.
translation.ja: 愛している 自分の事だけ

translation.en: Your pain.
Your hate.
- It's a long trip. In the air we'll talk. - Okay.
translation.ja: 長旅だわ 離陸したら話しましょ

translation.en: What's going on?
- We have a problem. - What?
We have to stop, and I've got to refuel.
We filed a landing permit this morning but they're saying they don't have it.
translation.ja: 提出した着陸許可書が ないと言ってる

translation.en: That's impossible.
It can't be an accident. What do you want to do?
translation.ja: 偶然ではない　どうします？

translation.en: They're sending someone to collect our copy.
translation.ja: コピーを取りに人を寄こすと

translation.en: - How long's that gonna take? - Fifteen minutes. Thirty maybe.
translation.ja: 何分で？ 15分 もしくは30分

translation.en: What if one of us ran it over, would we be able to get back in time?
translation.ja: 誰かが走って持って行けば？

translation.en: Can someone from your crew go?
I am not leaving any of my crew behind.
translation.ja: 誰も置き去りにはしない

translation.en: I'll go.
Give me the permit.
- Landing permits. El Al. Who do I...? - Traffic at three o'clock.
translation.ja: エル･アルの許可書だ 誰に…？

translation.en: Okay. They can go now.
Immediately, or the next slot's in 15 minutes.
translation.ja: 今すぐ もしくは15分後

translation.en: - Fifteen minutes. - That gives you time to re- board.
translation.ja: 15分… 戻る時間は十分ある

translation.en: Do it. Send the plane now.
translation.ja: 飛ばしてくれ 今すぐ

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, we have been cleared to take off.
translation.ja: 離陸の許可が下りました

translation.en: What about Peter?
You know that I have Inspector Rega following behind me,
and when he arrives this friendly conversation is over.
Let go! Let go! My father is on that plane!
translation.ja: 放せ！ 父さんがあの飛行機に！

translation.en: Let go!
Let go!
Ladies and gentlemen of the Knesset,
translation.ja: クネセトの紳士と淑女よ

translation.en: a short time ago, the most notorious Nazi war criminal,
translation.ja: 史上最も凶悪なナチス戦犯

translation.en: Adolf Eichmann, responsible with the Nazi leaders
translation.ja: アドルフ･アイヒマン ６百万のユダヤ人を―

translation.en: for the extermination of six million of the Jews of Europe,
translation.ja: 殺戮(さつりく)したナチス 首謀格の１人を―

translation.en: has been discovered and apprehended.
Adolf Eichmann is already under arrest in Israel.
translation.ja: アイヒマンはすでに イスラエルで拘束されている

translation.en: He will shortly be placed on trial in Jerusalem
translation.ja: ナチスを裁く法に基づいて―

translation.en: under the terms of the law for the trial of Nazis and their helpers.
translation.ja: エルサレムで間もなく 裁判が開かれる

translation.en: All fixed.
Take her with you.
Ticket.
Identification. Very nice.
translation.ja: 身分証明書 ご立派だな

translation.en: Join the back of the line.
- Tickets. - Peter.
It's quite a line.
It's all right. I'll help you get in.
I stand here before you, judges of Israel,
translation.ja: イスラエルの裁判官を 前にし―

translation.en: to lead the prosecution of Adolf Eichmann,
translation.ja: アドルフ･アイヒマンを 告訴するのは―

translation.en: but I am not standing alone.
With me are six million accusers.
But they cannot rise to their feet, and point toward him who sits in the dock
translation.ja: ただその人達は そこに座っている人物を―

translation.en: and cry out, j'accuse!
translation.ja: 指差す事ができません

translation.en: For their ashes
are piled up on the hills of Auschwitz and in the fields of Treblinka.
translation.ja: アウシュビッツと トレブリンカに散ったから

translation.en: Their blood cries out,
but their voice is not heard.
Therefore, today I will be their spokesman.
translation.ja: よって代わりに 私が声を上げます

translation.en: And in their name, I will unfold the awesome indictment.
translation.ja: 彼らの名もと― 起訴を進めていきます

translation.en: The history of the Jewish people is steeped in suffering and tears.
translation.ja: ユダヤの歴史は 苦しみと涙に染まっている

translation.en: Yet never, down the entire blood- stained road traveled by this people,
translation.ja: 我々がたどってきた 血塗られた道においても…

translation.en: never since the first...
Hey.
They say the only thing Eichmann will talk about
translation.ja: アイヒマンが話すのは―

translation.en: is what the cover of his autobiography's gonna look like.
translation.ja: 自伝の表紙について だけだそうだ

translation.en: - You chosen yours yet? - No.
You think Miriam would let me make that decision?
translation.ja: ミリアムが 選ばせてくれるとでも？

translation.en: She barely lets me choose breakfast.
translation.ja: 朝食さえ選べないのに

translation.en: You gonna go back in?
I don't know.
You don't have to.
Fruma won't hate you for letting go.
translation.ja: フルマも許してくれる

translation.en: You got him. Remember that.
- Yeah. It wasn't just me, Raf. - Ah.
It doesn't matter anyway. No one's gonna know it was us.
translation.ja: 誰が知る訳でもないし

translation.en: History only remembers the tall people.
translation.ja: 歴史は背の高い奴が書く

translation.en: - What about Napoleon? - Who?
translation.ja: ナポレオンは？ 誰それ？
